Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Megatron:





Megatron's eyes widened as he saw the auto-guns fire. He jumped back and 
dodged his body as best he could. He danced on his feet, watching as some of 
the shots land in front of him.

He jumped straight into the air, letting his flight mode take over. He 
transformed to beast mode, and a second later, he was hit in the chest. He 
body slammed into the ground.

He kicked his leg out and got to his feet. He growled. "Fool! You have made 
a mistake of your lives!" He returned to the air. "I'll be back!" He took 
off.
